name: fallen_empires
description: Fallen Empires mechanical pack: Thrulls & sacrifice, Thallids & spore counters, Homarid tide cycle, Icatian Soldiers, Orders of Leitbur/Ebon Hand, Orc/Goblin warfare, token engines, and storage lands.

CreatureStatic: Banding (Any number of attacking creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group.)
This creature has protection from black.
As long as this creature is attacking, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.
Activated: {W}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}{W}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Instant: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature and each blocking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature has protection from black.

CreatureStatic: This creature enters the battlefield with a tide counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a tide counter on it. As long as there is exactly one tide counter on it, it gets -1/-1. As long as there are exactly three tide counters on it, it gets +1/+1. Whenever there are four or more tide counters on it, remove all tide counters from it.
Activated: {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a blue creature: Create X 1/1 blue Camarid creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.
{U}, {T}: Counter target activated ability unless its controller pays {1}.
Instant: Tap all blocking creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature and each blocking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Enchantment: Cast this spell only if no permanents named Tidal Influence are on the battlefield. This enters the battlefield with a tide counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a tide counter on this. As long as there is exactly one tide counter on this, blue creatures get -2/-0. As long as there are exactly three tide counters on this, blue creatures get +2/-0. Whenever there are four or more tide counters on this, remove all tide counters from it.

CreatureStatic: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards at random.
Activated: Sacrifice a Thrull: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Instant: Target player discards two cards at random.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {B}{B}. At the beginning of your end step, create a 0/1 black Thrull creature token.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+1. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

Activated: {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{R}: Target Orc gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Instant: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. This spell deals 5 damage to any target.
Target creature can't block this turn.
Sorcery: This spell deals {X} damage divided as you choose among up to {X} targets.

CreatureStatic: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on this creature. Remove three spore counters from it: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: This creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
Activated: {1}, Exile two creature cards from a single graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Forests you control become 2/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
Instant: Tap all blocking creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature and each blocking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Enchantment: Whenever a player plays a Swamp, this enchantment deals 3 damage to that player unless they put a -1/-1 counter on a creature they control.
AuraCreature: Enchanted creature has '{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target' if it has three or more spore counters on it.

Land: This land enters the battlefield tapped. You may choose not to untap it during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, if it's tapped, put a storage counter on it. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from it: Add one mana of any one color for each storage counter removed this way.
Artifact: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card, then discard a card at random.
